name: LeadFerret
tag_list: free-b2b-data, free-b2b-database, free-b2b-directory, free-b2b-email-database, free-b2b-email-directory, free-b2b-lists, free-business-data, free-business-database, free-business-directory, free-business-lists, free-company-data, free-company-lists, free-
overview:
LeadFerret is world’s largest free business-to-business database with complete information, including email addresses.

Every record in LeadFerret is complete with company, name, title, address, phone number and most importantly email address.

The best thing about LeadFerret is that it’s completely FREE.

You don’t have to upload any data, earn any points, or pay anything. Just go to LeadFerret.com, search for the records you want and you’ll soon be viewing them on your screen without paying a dime, or jumping through any hoops.

external_links.title: LeadFerret.com Offers 100% Free Online B2B Database with Emails!
